price: Amekupeni wanyama wa kufuga na wana.
footnotes: Kama alivyo kupeni mifugo kama ngamia, na ng'ombe, na kondoo, na mbuzi, na wana wenye nguvu, wakukulindieni mifugo yenu, na kukusaidieni katika shida za maisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
